millsfield:images_texts:
memory is one which you will long cherish.
Single
passengers, $15.00.
Special rates for parties.
BIMINI-NASSAU AIR LINES-Regular service
to the Bahama Island ports.
Over the Gulf Stream
to Bimini in 50 minutes and from thence to Nassau
in another 90 minutes.
Nothing can
surpass
the
beauty of these coral islands as viewed from the air.
They set like gems in a sea of azure blue and never
until the advent of aviation have even their inhabi-
tants realized their glorious colorings. Your esthetic
self will be transported to higher
realms than even
the staunchest airplane could carry you.
TO CUBA BY AIR—Over the Keys of southern
Florida. A panoramic survey of the gigantic engin-
eering feat accomplished by the Florida East Coast .
Railway.
Then by way of Key West to Morro Castle
_the Bastile of America's Paris-Havana.
PASSPORTS—-For
passengers who wish to em-
bark for points abroad, a short notice will be neces-
sary in order that they
may
obtain passports, a
matter which will be facilitated by
the Passenger
Department,
every effort being made to help pas-
sengers
in
obtaining
the required papers.
Delays
are rarely experienced.
In conclusion let us say that a trip in the an
under the conditions of
safetv and comfort provided
by Aero Limited is an
attraction difficult to resist.
Travel through the air is
smooth
and steady and
devoid of
any obstacle or restriction
such
as no
perfect roadway or water
route can boast. Ask
anyone who has made a trip.
AERO LIMITED
First Aerial Passenger Routes in America
New York, N. Y. Miami, Fla.
Nassau, B. I.
20 W. 34th St.
Elser's
Pier
Hotel Lucerne
C. Nicholas Reinhardt, G. P. A.
R. T. Bellchambers, P. A.
THE HEFTY PRESS, MIAMI
